K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-6: de bzhin dril sgras mdzes par byed du gcig gyur pas //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-7: 'di na byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig 'di 'dra ba'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-8: mdo sde 'di thos lus la gnas par 'gyur ba'am //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-9: glegs bam bri ba byas te gzhag par byed 'dod na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-10: de ni de yi bsod nams 'bras bu khyad par 'phags //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-11: ser sna'i dri ma bsal bar gyur cing 'jigs med pa'i //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-12: byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos 'di 'dzin byed na //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-13: de yi bsod nams dpag tu yod par mi 'gyur te //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-14: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byang chub thob par 'gyur //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-15: mdo 'di bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis rab bsngags shing //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-16: byang chub sems dpa' mang pos yongs su bzung ba yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku lus nam mkha' yi //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-18: khams dang 'dra ba thams cad 'dir ni bstan pa yin //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:534b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:535a-2: nyan thos chen po grangs med pa bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa dag dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:535a-7: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:535a-8: 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so ////
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:535a-9: rgya gar gyi mkhan po su rendra bo dhi dang /
K10acip-k_lha_sa-049-002:535a-10: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa /
